amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Victoria Nuland, Acting United States Deputy Secretary of State and Under Secretary for Political Affairs, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 268 (Roll no. 493).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 268 (Roll no. 493).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
